headline: Here's Why Investors Should Bet on Wabtec Stock Right Now
summary: WAB's growing backlog and aggressive shareholder returns are lifting its performance, helping the stock beat its industry and surge over the past year.

headline: 1 Volatile Stock on Our Watchlist and 2 We Brush Off
summary: Volatility cuts both ways - while it creates opportunities, it also increases risk, making sharp declines just as likely as big gains. This unpredictability can shake out even the most experienced investors.
